name: MonorailNewsWeekly
0:

”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”

Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: Every week a group of your favorite authors and hosts from Monorail News get together and discuss everything Disney and Disney Parks. This is your chance to get inside the magic.No additional setup required.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
